column4: I'm trying to get a new server working with email (postfix/dovecot) and I've clearly flubbed it. How can I nuke the configs and get to a clean spot to start over?
Using apt-get remove dovecot postfix etc. did not remove old .conf files e.g. /etc/dovecot/dovecot.conf
So I tried nuking that directory and re-installing the package, but now I don't even have default .conf
